title: Operational PDMP start date
name: OpPdmpDt
description: Date when a “modern system” became operational and users could access. Source: Horowitz et al., 2018, Table 2, column 4. This definition includes specific caveats adopted by Horowitz et al., 2018, described further below in Notes.
source_long: RAND-USC Schaeffer Opioid Policy Tools and Information Center, 2021
